title: Question 15
prompt: A local news reporter announced this morning that a category 3 hurricane is predicted to hit the island within the next 48 hours. Thousands of people have begun the the process of evacuating the island. _____________________. These individuals are in great danger and are being encouraged to leave. The government is urging all citizens to take proper precautions as the winds pick up in speed.
description: Read the paragraph.  Then choose the sentence that best fills the blank in the paragraph.
feedback: The best sentence to complete the paragraph is: “However, many have decided to remain on the island.” The following sentence mentions that “these individuals” are in danger. The preceding sentence must describe people who are in danger due to the storm; it makes sense that the people who are in danger are the ones who don’t plan to evacuate.
